Spells:
Align Weapon (Protean2 Tran): Touched weapon gains alignment for 20 min (DC 14 Will neg)
Chaos Hammer (Protean4 Evoc): R300' Lawful creatures in 20' radius suffer 5d8 HP and are slowed (-2 AC, attack, damage, and Reflex) for 1d6 rd, neutral half (DC 16 Will half)
Cloak Of Chaos (Protean8 Abju): 20 creatures in 20' radius gain +4 AC and saves and SR 25 (lawful), suppress mental control, and cause 1 rd confusion in successful lawful attacker for 20 rd (DC 20 Will neg)
Cone Of Cold (Oceans6 Evoc): R60' Cone inflicts 15d6 HP (DC 18 Ref half)
Control Water (Oceans4 Tran): R1200' Raises or lowers 20 10'x10'x2' of water 40' for 200 min
Dispel Law (Protean5 Abju): Self gains +4 AC vs. lawful and dismisses lawful creature via touch (DC 17 Will neg) or spell
Displacement (Protean3 Illu): Foes attacking touched suffer 50% miss chance for 20 rd
Elemental Body IV (Oceans7 Tran): Self becomes huge air (+4 Strength, +6 Dexterity, +4 AC, fly 120', whirlwind), earth (+8 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +6 AC, earth glide), fire (+6 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, +4 AC, resist fire, burn), or water (+4 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +8 Constitution, +6 AC, swim 120', vortex, breathe water) elemental, gains 60' darkvision, immunity to bleeding, critical hits, and sneak attacks, DR 5/- for 20 min
Horrid Wilting (Oceans8 Necr): R1200' Creatures in 30' radius suffer 20d6 HP (plants or water elementals 20d8 HP) (DC 20 Fort half)
Ice Storm (Oceans5 Evoc): R1200' Hail in 20' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, 2d6 HP cold, -4 Perception for 20 rd
Lesser Confusion (Protean1 Ench): R300' Target randomly 25% acts normal/25% babbles/25% attacks themselves/25% attacks nearest for 1 rd (DC 13 Will neg)
Obscuring Mist (Oceans1 Conj): Fog in 20' radius obscures vision for 20 min
Planar Binding (Protean6 Conj): Traps extraplanar creature(s) w/up to 12 HD (DC 18 Will neg) until they escape (SR, dimensional travel, or 27 Cha) or perform a task (Opposed Cha neg)
Slipstream (Oceans2 Conj): Creates wave that moves touched 10'/rd for 200 min
Summon Monster IX (Protean9 Conj): R75' 1 9th-, 1d3 8th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Tsunami (Oceans9 Conj): R1200' 10'x10'x40' wave moves 60'/rd (water) or 30'/rd (land), inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning (DC 21 Fort half), +30 CMB to knock down and sweep away for 5 rd
Water Walk (Oceans3 Tran): 20 touched can walk on liquid as if it were a solid surface for 200 min
Word Of Chaos (Protean7 Evoc): Nonchaotic creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD deafened for 1d4 rd (DC 19 Will neg)/stunned for 1 rd (DC 19 Will neg)/confused for 1d10 min (DC 19 Will for 1 rd)/killed (DC 19 Will 3d6+20 HP) and banished (DC 19 Will neg)
